alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:36PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Windham, west central Kent and Providence Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Foster, or 8 miles northwest of Coventry, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, North Attleborough, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Killingly, Bellingham, Burrillville, Uxbridge, North Smithfield and Wrentham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
